channel.title: How to double-post on MoparScape! [ONLY 4 DA TRUE HAXORS, VERY ADVANCED!]
channel.description:
1) Post.
2) Have another user post.
3) Post again.
4) Have the other user that posted remove his message.
GRTZZZ! U R NOAW A TRU HAXCKOR! HURRY, DO IT NAOW B4 IT GETS PATCHED!
Lol.
